alternatives.transcript: tonight on evening magazine Kitty did everything from a horizontal position try to get ahead is it truth or trash I've been accused of the worst things in the world I mean there's nothing else they can accuse me of the poison pen stings Kitty Kelley plus my role is to get 5,000 kids smoking every day the Winston ad man tonight

by now we all know about the dangers of smoking yet still millions of people take the risk and cigarette companies continue to advertise and no one is more aware of that than Dave girl it's he was the rugged Winston man posing with a cigarette hanging from his lips will now the One Time Winston man is fighting the industry that you

used to treat him like a king for six years David girl it's was the Winston cigarettes man he was paid hundreds of thousands of dollars to limos everywhere beautiful women hung on his arm but the very industry that gave him everything took away something else very dear his help so this day I haven't tasted food and seven and a half years I have no feeling in my left leg from my hip to my kneecap I had to learn how to walk again

I have no feeling in two fingers I have no feeling in the side of my face but at least I'm alive to maybe do some good a decade ago David's chiseled face adorned every Winston billboard bus card and magazine ad I was hired by RJ Reynolds to be the live version of the GI Joe action figure to encourage entice lure trick and skiing new consumers which happened to be children my role is to get 5,000 kids smoking every day David did that job very

well these rugged Macho ads took Winston from fourth to second place in sales when he wasn't pushing cigarettes David worked on Films he was Harrison Ford stand-in in the film witnessed one day on the set David experience the effects of his own three pack-a-day habit when afternoon my face started to quiver and within three hours my whole mouth was twisted up I look really gross and I became concerned with a total of five hours that had worked his way down my entire left side

the Winston man had suffered a stroke however when he somewhat recovered he resumed his habit and did more Winston as soon after though David received word his brother had cancer so David was forced to visit a Cancer Ward there's a gut-wrenching experience there when people ask you to leave because they knew I was the Winston man and certainly they didn't like me I wasn't applauded when I went there because I was the reason why they were there David finally

cold turkey on November 17 1988 but today the effects of smoking still linger he has arterial sclerosis little feeling on the left side of his body and no sense of taste he also gave up his Winston image I love my role reason why I love my role was because I dreamed about being the kind of image that I was my whole life at 13 I wasn't rugged Macho robust as my ads depict the 13 I was cross-eyed I was 233 pounds and I was a chronic bed-wetter till I was

16 now David is fighting the very industry that gave him Fame today he's leading a protest against Philip Morris the largest tobacco manufacturer in the world he's fighting because the words of his former bosses still echo in his ear RJ Reynolds told me the right to smoke was reserved for the young the poor the black and the stupid I was used to glamorize cigarette smoking and it's a lie if I've been influential in any way and starting you smoking whether you're 12 or 20 please accept

apology David still carries the guilt of having tried to persuade 5,000 kids a day to start smoking now he wants to reach them before they start the deadly habit the real Macho kind of an image huh now instead of doing slick magazine ads David's posing for a poster that takes pot shots at his former employer this helps David sleep better knowing that he's part of the solution instead of part of the problem unfortunately he's already ruined

much of his own health and his modeling career has gone up in smoke I just happened to be a bad name for the tobacco industry right now my name is mud we don't do lunch anymore but that's okay and if you think smoking doesn't hurt anyone but you think again just yesterday Pediatrics magazine published a study showing that secondary smoke that smoke your kids inhale from your cigarette increases their risk for heart disease we've known for a while that it damages the children's lungs
now their hearts are taking a beating that's something to think about before you light up again
